mapper.sql: a.menu_id as id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids, a.name, a.href, a.target, a.icon, a.sort, a.is_show, a.permission, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, p.name AS "parent.name"
LEFT JOIN t_sys_menu p ON p.menu_id = a.parent_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_sys_menu a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.sort
SELECT a.menu_id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids FROM t_sys_menu a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.sort

SELECT DISTINCT
FROM t_sys_menu a LEFT JOIN t_sys_menu p ON p.menu_id = a.parent_id JOIN t_sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = a.menu_id JOIN t_sys_role r ON r.role_id = rm.role_id AND r.useable='1' JOIN t_sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN t_sys_user u ON u.user_id = ur.user_id AND u.user_id = #{userId} WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND r.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND u.status = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.sort
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_menu( menu_id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, href, target, icon, sort, is_show, permission, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{href}, #{target}, #{icon}, #{sort}, #{isShow}, #{permission}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sys_menu SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, href = #{href}, target = #{target}, icon = #{icon}, sort = #{sort}, is_show = #{isShow}, permission = #{permission}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE menu_id = #{id}
UPDATE t_sys_menu SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE menu_id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
